channel.title: Deltascape questions
channel.description:
I'm using richscape base but its nulled, that means, u can't host it 24//7 becus after a certain time its getting nulled. So i'm thinking about using deltascape's source. But i got somequestions:
1: How do i change/delete teleport names + coords? 2. How do i make it so u have every quests done? 3. How do i make it so you start in another place than fally.
This are my first questions. If i got more questions i edit this post
-jarnohhh

item.title: Deltascape questions
item.dc:creator: @magep00ner12 magep00ner12
item.description:
@magep00ner12 wrote:

  1. The names in texthandler.java
    For the coords go to clickingmost.java and search for
			case 50245: // edgeville teleport

You can change the coords there.

  1. In player.java search for
			// Setting Levels

then under playerLevel[i] = 10;
add

q1 = 15; q2 = 15;
etc. Add those till q11

  1. In player.java search for // initial x and y coordinates of the player
    then you’ll see something like:

toX = absX+misc.random(2); toY = absY+misc.random(3);

Read full topic

item.title: Deltascape questions
item.dc:creator: @jarnohhh jarnohhh
item.description:
@jarnohhh wrote:

I want if you start you get every quests done and oh yeah it says something like Nullexeption or something.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 06, 2008, 12:29:27 pm[/size][hr]Nullpointerexeption r somethin

Read full topic

item.title: Deltascape questions
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

It’s not nulled, but if you showed me what the ‘null’ was I could fix it for my next version (if I haven’t already)

Anyways,

1 - TextHandler for the names, clickingMost for coordinates
2 - Change it in your character file
3 - Player class

Read full topic

item.title: Deltascape questions
item.dc:creator: @jarnohhh jarnohhh
item.description:
@jarnohhh wrote:

In the clicking most are only the names, not the coords.

Read full topic

item.description:
@gamma wrote:

I’m pretty sure the teleports are in clicking most, or at least thats what i heard.

And about the other two try asking Jayden.
